response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $13,500. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value, making it an attractive opportunity for you. I understand its importance to you, valued at $12,000, and I hope this offer aligns well with your budget and needs.
